short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to promote respectful communication.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RespectablyAI is a Chrome extension designed to promote respectful and inclusive digital communication. It does this by analyzing user-generated text in real-time, identifying any potential biases or non-inclusive language, and offering more respectful alternative suggestions. The extension serves the single purpose of fostering more empathetic, understanding, and respectful communication in various digital platforms.
